# Preface {-}

This is my attempt to learn to use Git and Gitlab.

# Key concepts

## Local and remote

This is easy: local means your local machine, and remote means Gitlab (or Github, if this is what you use). A nice workflow is: firstly create a repository at Gitlab and then click on the **Clone** button there to have the URL; secondly create a project at RStudio and enter the URL when required.
